title: NYDJ womens Barbara - Bootcut jeans, Black, 12 US
features: BOOTCUT JEANS FOR WOMEN: Not too long, not too short, the NYDJ Barbara Bootcut Jeans with Tall Inseam fit just right. Get a flatter-looking midriff and a perfect rise, so you can look and feel your best. No gaps, no problems.

EXCLUSIVE LIFT TUCK TECHNOLOGY: This unique technology uses a proprietary slimming panel with a patented criss-cross design to shape and support your curves for an always-sleek silhouette. It will lift, slim, and flatten in the front for a flattering fit.
MEASUREMENTS: Inseam runs 36 inches, high rise is 9.75 inches, with a leg opening of 17.5 inches. Due to the Lift Tuck Technology, select one size down from what you normally wear for the best fit.
CLASSIC DESIGN: With a traditional bootcut fit and five-pocket styling, these bootcut jeans for women are timeless and versatile, so you can wear them with all your tops from season to season.
EASY TO CLEAN: Keep your slimming bootcut jeans in their best condition by machine washing in cold water and line drying. 72% Cotton, 20% Lyocell, 5% Elastomultiester, 3% Elastane.
description: Not too long, not too short—the NYDJ Barbara Bootcut Jeans with Tall Inseam fit just right. Our exclusive Lift Tuck Technology uses a proprietary slimming panel with a patented criss-cross design to give this comfortable, go-to denim style its superior shaping powers. Get a flatter-looking midriff and a perfect rise, so you can look and feel your best. No gaps, no problems. A traditional bootcut fit and classic five-pocket styling add an effortless appeal to this closet staple.MATERIAL: 72% Cotton, 20% Lyocell, 5% Elastomultiester, 3% Elastane.SIZING: Inseam: 36", High Rise: 9.75", Leg Opening: 17.5". Select one size smaller for the perfect fit.NYDJ, formally known as Not Your Daughter's Jeans, creates jeans for every body: all shapes, all sizes, and all ages. Founded in 2003, NYDJ set out to design premium stretch jeans with a fabulous fit that makes every woman feel comfortable and confident—like her best self. All NYDJ jeans are made with Lift Tuck Technology, a proprietary slimming panel with a patented criss-cross design to flatten in the front and curve-contouring construction to flatter curves in the back. Headquartered in Los Angeles and inspired by California style and the latest denim trends, NYDJ is always working to bring you the most innovative denim technologies as well as the chicest non-denim pants and pair-perfect tops.
